name: seaQuest DSV
overview: seaQuest DSV, the future's largest, most powerful submarine, is at your command! Pilot through pirate-infested waters and take on a variety of challenges. To succeed, you must take control of all of seaquest's futuristic navigational and weapon systems. Explore the depths, answer distress calls, and conduct WHISKER scans to locate various mission sites. There you'll choose from the Hyper-Reality Probe, Darwin the dolphin, or four different launch vehicles to complete your missions. Conduct dangerous rescues, recover sunken treasure, and most of all, keep the peace in a troubled underwater world. The bridge is yours, captain.
